properties.description: Open from We are open already!. We want to offer a space that is Warm and Welcoming to anyone. We have games and puzzles for all ages as well as toys for younger children. Bottomless teas and coffees with optional light snacks. We have busier shared areas or quieter spaces if you prefer.

properties.description: Open from 2 November. All are welcome - activity and lunch aimed at elderly but we have also a room for toddlers (with parent supervision). We have a comfortable lounge with newspapers and can provide hot and cold drinks throughout the day. At 11am there is an optional activity eg, quiz or craft and at 12.30pm there is a hot two course lunch (optional).
properties.title: Sydenham Salvation Army

properties.address: 58 Movilla Road, Newtownards, Co Down BT23 8RG
properties.description: We cater for all ages and have a designated children's corner with toys. We provide a warm welcoming space to come to with plenty of comfortable chairs and free refreshments. We also have a table tennis table and snooker table along with board games available. There is plenty of safe parking in our car park.

properties.address: West Presbyterian Church, Bangor, County Down BT191BG
properties.description: Open from 19-10-2022. Warm Welcome in West is open to everyone in our Community. We have games, newspapers & puzzles to enjoy as well as toys for younger children. There is also the opportunity to chat confidentially with one of the staff team, chat with volunteers, enjoy the company of others or quiet time on your own if preferred.
